text: That sounds great! And photoshop is still the tool people use. I sit by some digital matte painters at work, and they just use photoshop. Occasionally they may use a niche software to make things like mountains and clouds. Haha and no problem, I didn't get a notif anyway xD

Ahh that’s fair XD  I didn’t get the notif either :sweat_smile: and okay that’s good to know, have you ever had people animating in Photoshop before? Like I mentioned to one of my lecturers that I was gonna do that yesterday and he looked at me like I was weird for doing it :sweat_smile:
animdresses2 is a plugin I used once! I made a little teddy bear animation using it once :3
(I should really readback my sentences before I hit send lol)
It's totally not weird. I'm sure people make animations with much worse things than a photoshop plugin haha
Ah that’s so cool! & yeah haha true, I mean anything is good right? X3 and yeah is there any you’d recommend not using though??
Hm, I guess I'm not experienced enough with 2d animation software to comment on what not to use.. :S I could comment on 3d software, but not sure how useful that is to you!
